Var to set : TGITE_get_Tag : use this var to set the tag to find to builde var aray ( Mandatory ) TGITE_Level_Item_Info : Use this var to set which geted item part to keep ( Mandatory ) TGITE_file_to_parse : use this var to set which file to parse to get items ( Mandatory ) ${1} : use this var to set [ TGITE_get_Tag ] ${2} : use this var to set [ TGITE_Level_Item_Info ] ${3} : use this var to set [ TGITE_file_to_parse ]
Base usage : Get_tool_items_exe "TGITE_get_Tag" "TGITE_Level_Item_Info" "TGITE_file_to_parse" [ "TGITE_Field_Serpparator" ] Description : This function scan a file to creat a array of function to execute
Send Back : function execution
